comment: I really wanted to give her the benefit of the doubt, but this class is exactly what the other reviews mentioned. Yes, she gives you a study guide thats almost like the actual test, until she adds a few things that can easily mess you up. Showing up to class is your best bet.

This class isn't easy with any other professor. There is no homework no extra credit and no other grades other than exams. There were 6 exams and 1 optional final. She makes this material easy to understand by breaking it down with one chapter per exam. study guides are just like the exams. Practice the study guide a few times and you will breeze.

Professor Brotman was by far one of the worst college professors I have seen. Her lectures were impossible to follow because she wears a mask over her mouth and her handwriting is chicken scratch. Her tests are exactly like the review she does before the test. Don't think I learned anything in this class.

Test is in person nothing is online.
Notes are handwritten so you might get confused.
Can barely understand her because she talks soft
Caring teacher but you can still get lost.

Dr. Brotman has informative lectures accompanied by a great teaching style! Writing down the notes in class really helps the information stick, and the exams reflected everything covered in class. Dr. Brotman is kind and helpful when it comes to helping students fully understand the material. Conceptually, the course material is very applicable.

Her class is entirely her working out problems on a legal pad she projects on to the wall. She is incredibly difficult to follow baseline, combine this with her terrible handwriting, the fact she is constantly messing up her math and going back to correct it and talks hardly above a whisper. Only redemption is questions are identical to the exam.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Do not take this professor she is the absolute worst professor I have ever had

This class was one of those you just take for an elective. At least for me. If you're a math savvy person and want an easy to get by class this would be one to take. However, if you're looking for fulfillment then look elsewhere. An A is definitely attainable if you work through the problems two or three times right before exams. I was just lazy.

comment: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE! Don't try to be a hero, like I did, and ignore the warnings. I thought 'eh can't be this bad'. No, she isn't, she is WORSE! Very very difficult to understand her speaking, even more impossible to understand her scribbling on a piece of paper, which is pretty much the entirety of her teaching. A page of chicken scratch!
How is this professor a professor?
Super easy class with Billie. She literally gives you the exam the class before with different numbers and shows you exactly how to do it in class.
Her exams on average take 3 hours to take according to me and everyone in the group me. She only gives 4 exams all semester and grades nothing else. Choose a different professor.

Mumbles through lectures, does not explain anything whatsoever, and tests every two weeks. She is by far the worst teacher I have ever had and if you do not need to take her class I suggest not to. Get ready to teach yourself for the whole semester, this lady is a certified bozo.

She is the worse professor I ever had. The many things that earned this possible zero-rating are: having 6 exams every two weeks, mumbling during the lecture, skipping vital material in chapters, and being demotivating. This class felt like a genuine thorn in my side and made me doubt if I should pursue a business degree.

Pathetic excuse for a professor. Its impressive how bad she is at going into detail on materials and conveying general information. Incredibly lacking in resources for her students and is as unorganized as it gets. She dosent want to be in class and it is obvious and has little to no regard for students in any regard.
